input.sentences: our city hosted the high school soccer championships .
it was a fierce fight until the end .
people played with their best effort .
sometimes the rivalries between schools was intense .
the matches were fair and the best school won .
output.sentences: Our school hosted the soccer match.
The players were fierce and got into fights.
All the people played with lots of effort.
The two schools that were playing had an intense rivalry.
But the school made sure the matches were fair.
